name: sema-engine
description: Module containing Sema's signal engine and compiler for a live coding language ecossystem
author: Francisco Bernardo <f.bernardo@sussex.ac.uk>

scripts.build: rollup -c && cp dist/sema-engine.js dist/ringbuf.js dist/maxi-processor.js dist/maximilian.wasmmodule.js examples/
scripts.dev: rollup -c -w && cp dist/sema-engine.js dist/ringbuf.js dist/maxi-processor.js dist/maximilian.wasmmodule.js examples/
